verses.text: \w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w led|strong="G2424"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G1519"\w* \w tempted|strong="G3985"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w after|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w fasted|strong="G3522"\w* \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w nights|strong="G3571"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w became|strong="G5306"\w* \w hungry|strong="G3983"\w*.

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w Tempter|strong="G3985"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: “\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w you|strong="G1487"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w stones|strong="G3037"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w become|strong="G1096"\w* loaves \w of|strong="G5207"\w* bread.”

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj “\+w Scripture|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w says|strong="G3004"\+w* – \wj* \wj ‘\+w It|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* bread \+w alone|strong="G3441"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w a|strong="G1909"\+w* person \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w live|strong="G2198"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w every|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w word|strong="G4487"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w comes|strong="G1607"\+w* \+w from|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w the|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w mouth|strong="G4750"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*.’”\wj*

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w devil|strong="G1228"\w* \w took|strong="G3880"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Holy|strong="G2413"\w* \w City|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, placing \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* parapet \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w temple|strong="G2413"\w*, \w said|strong="G5119"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*,

“\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, throw \w yourself|strong="G4572"\w* \w down|strong="G2736"\w*, \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1125"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w* – ‘\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w give|strong="G3004"\w* \w his|strong="G4012"\w* angels commands \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* lift \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w up|strong="G2532"\w*, \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w do|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G1510"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w strike|strong="G4350"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w foot|strong="G4228"\w* \w against|strong="G1909"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w stone|strong="G3037"\w*.’”

\wj “\+w Scripture|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w says|strong="G5346"\+w*,”\wj* \w answered|strong="G5346"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \wj “‘\+w You|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w must|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w tempt|strong="G1598"\+w* \+w the|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w your|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*.’”\wj*

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* third time, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w devil|strong="G1228"\w* \w took|strong="G3880"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w very|strong="G3029"\w* \w high|strong="G5308"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, showing \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* kingdoms \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* splendor, \w said|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*:

“\w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w fall|strong="G4098"\w* \w at|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G3956"\w* feet \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w me|strong="G1325"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \wj “\+w Go|strong="G5217"\+w* \+w away|strong="G5217"\+w*, \+w Satan|strong="G4567"\+w*! \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w scripture|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w says|strong="G3004"\+w* – \wj* \wj ‘\+w You|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w must|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w worship|strong="G4352"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w your|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w worship|strong="G4352"\+w* \+w him|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w only|strong="G3441"\+w*.’”\wj*

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w devil|strong="G1228"\w* left \w him|strong="G3588"\w* alone, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* angels \w came|strong="G4334"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* helped \w him|strong="G3588"\w*. The Work in Galilee

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* Jesus heard \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w had|strong="G3588"\w* been arrested, \w he|strong="G1161"\w* returned \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*.

Afterward, \w leaving|strong="G2641"\w* \w Nazareth|strong="G3478"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G2064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w settled|strong="G2730"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Capernaum|strong="G2584"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* side \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w sea|strong="G3864"\w*, \w within|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w borders|strong="G3725"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Zebulun|strong="G2194"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Naphtali|strong="G3508"\w*;

\w in|strong="G1223"\w* fulfillment \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w these|strong="G3588"\w* words \w in|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="G2268"\w* –

‘\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w land|strong="G1093"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Zebulun|strong="G2194"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w land|strong="G1093"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Naphtali|strong="G3508"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w land|strong="G1093"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Road|strong="G3598"\w* \w by|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w beyond|strong="G4008"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*, \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* –

\w The|strong="G1722"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* living \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w seen|strong="G3708"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w for|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* living \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* shadow-land \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w* \w has|strong="G3708"\w* dawned!’

\w At|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w time|strong="G5119"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w began|strong="G5119"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w proclaim|strong="G2784"\w* – \wj “\+w Repent|strong="G3340"\+w*, \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* kingdom \+w of|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w at|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w hand|strong="G1448"\+w*.”\wj*

\w As|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w walking|strong="G4043"\w* \w along|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* shore \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sea|strong="G2281"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* brothers – \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w*, \w also|strong="G2532"\w* known \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* brother Andrew – casting \w a|strong="G2532"\w* net \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* fishermen.

\wj “\+w Come|strong="G1205"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w follow|strong="G3694"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w*,”\wj* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj “\+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* teach \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* fish \+w for|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w people|strong="G4160"\+w*.”\wj*

\w The|strong="G1161"\w* two \w men|strong="G3588"\w* left \w their|strong="G3588"\w* \w nets|strong="G1350"\w* \w at|strong="G1161"\w* once \w and|strong="G1161"\w* followed \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w Going|strong="G2532"\w* further \w on|strong="G1722"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w other|strong="G1438"\w* \w men|strong="G1417"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* brothers, \w James|strong="G2385"\w*, \w Zebedee|strong="G2199"\w*’s son, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* brother \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w boat|strong="G4143"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w mending|strong="G2675"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w nets|strong="G1350"\w*. \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*,

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w at|strong="G1161"\w* once left \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w boat|strong="G4143"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* followed \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w synagogues|strong="G4864"\w*, \w proclaiming|strong="G2784"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w good|strong="G3956"\w* \w news|strong="G2098"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* kingdom, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* curing \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w kind|strong="G3956"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w disease|strong="G3119"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w kind|strong="G3956"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w sickness|strong="G3119"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*;

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* fame \w spread|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* through \w Syria|strong="G4947"\w*. \w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G4374"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w ill|strong="G2192"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w any|strong="G3956"\w* \w form|strong="G3956"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w disease|strong="G3554"\w*, \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w suffering|strong="G4912"\w* pain – \w any|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w either|strong="G2532"\w* \w possessed|strong="G2192"\w* \w by|strong="G2532"\w* demons, \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w lunatic|strong="G4583"\w*, \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w paralyzed|strong="G3885"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w cured|strong="G2323"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* followed \w by|strong="G2532"\w* \w large|strong="G4183"\w* \w crowds|strong="G3793"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* district \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Ten Towns, \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w Judea|strong="G2449"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w beyond|strong="G4008"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*.
